hero.title: Ship production-ready SaaS, reliable, secure and audit-ready.
hero.subtitle: Yamato Enterprise is a multi-tenant Next.js + shadcn/ui starter with RBAC, audit trails, and a retractable sidebar UX. Build secure dashboards your customers love—without wiring the basics.

features.heading: Everything you need
features.subheading: Stop wiring the foundation—focus on your moat. Yamato Enterprise ships batteries-included for modern multi-tenant SaaS.

items.title: Multi-tenant & billing
items.desc: Isolation first. Stripe-ready hooks and per-tenant config out of the box.

items.title: RBAC & audit
items.desc: Granular roles, permissions, and audit trails for compliance-friendly teams.

items.title: Teams & invites
items.desc: Org-level access, SSO-ready patterns, and member management.

items.title: Secure by default
items.desc: Best-practice headers, session hardening, and input sanitization.

items.title: API & jobs
items.desc: Typed endpoints and background-jobs pattern for long-running tasks.

items.title: DX tuned
items.desc: shadcn/ui, Tailwind, and a clean module layout so you ship faster.

items.title: PII vault & redaction
items.desc: Field-level encryption, tokenization, and secure views for sensitive data.

items.title: i18n & locale routing
items.desc: Localized routes, ICU formats, number/date pluralization, RTL support.

items.title: Background jobs & queue
items.desc: Queue adapter (Redis/SQS) + job dashboard for retries and scheduling.

items.title: Developer CLI
items.desc: Scaffold modules, run code-mods, seed tenants, and sync environments.

items.title: Audit exports & SIEM
items.desc: Tamper-evident audit log with CSV/Parquet export and SIEM sinks.

items.title: File storage & media
items.desc: Signed uploads, image transforms, and lifecycle policies per tenant.

cta.heading: Ready to launch your next SaaS?
cta.badge: Let {brand} handle the basic and boring parts.
cta.copy: Start from a secure, multi-tenant foundation with a polished UI and sane defaults.
